item.title: Book Reviews: Mathematics
item.description: First semester is over and with it I think it’s time to give a review of books I read over it’s course with few extra books I liked from previous years. This isn’t an amazon review this is just a page that may help a future student start somewhere this my personal opinion about the books and approaches may differ. Set Theory I’ll point you the MIRI’s recommended book Naive Set Theory.

item.title: Reinventing The Ductape and The Creation of Opensource
item.description: Inventing a better duct tape for a duct-tape solvable situation . Duct tape is one of those inventions that we really don’t think about they seem obvious in hindsight ; oh . Like the wheel or the glass or the table , duct tape is an all-things invention that fits in many situations , yet we can’t really think of a reinvention of it because it’s really at the lowest tier of the inventions pyramid .
